TERMS OF USE
Last Updated: February 18, 2026

6. Disclaimers The App is provided “as is.” We disclaim all warranties.
7. Limitation of Liability Our liability is limited to the fullest extent permitted by law.
8. Indemnification You agree to indemnify us from claims arising from your use of the App.
9. Governing Law These terms are governed by the laws of Israel.
10. Contact Information For questions about these Terms, contact: Email: [your@email.com]
11. Changes to Terms We may update these Terms. Your continued use of the App constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
